name: クリア
message: "I'm so happy you're my master. Thank you. Thank you so much."

name: 蒼葉
message: "It's really not that big a deal."

name: クリア
message: "I'm just telling you how I feel."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...It's kind of embarrassing, though."

name: クリア
message: "Oh, right!"
Clear rummages around in his pockets again.

name: クリア
message: "Where's my mask..."
He comes up with his gas mask.
How do those pockets even work?
While I marvel at this mystery, Clear looks me straight in the eye.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Hm?"

name: クリア
message: "Master... um, nevermind..."
Clear looks away.

name: 蒼葉
message: "What's wrong?"

name: クリア
message: "...Um, I just remembered one other thing I wanted to ask you. Do you mind?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Go ahead."

name: クリア
message: "I used your name earlier..."
He did? Was it when he was talking with those other Clears?
I didn't notice at all, the situation being what it was.

name: クリア
message: "Um... would you mind if I used your name one more time? Your real name, not 'Master.'"

name: クリア
message: "...No. Let me rephrase. Please, Master... let me say your name."
His words remind me of the conversation he had with Ren in Glitter.
Clear argued that it was only natural to call his master 'Master.' He couldn't understand why Ren calls me by name.
But now that very same Clear is asking to use my name.
...This is a pretty big deal, right?
If Clear is recognizing me not as his "Master," but as "Aoba," that means...

name: クリア
message: "Is that a no?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Of course you can."

name: クリア
message: "Really?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah."

name: クリア
message: "...Thank you."
Clear looks me right in the eyes and slowly brings his face close to mine.

name: クリア
message: "Aoba... I love you."
My eyes go wide at the unexpected confession.

name: 蒼葉
message: "What do you think you're...?!"

name: クリア
message: "I'm sorry. It just came out. Because... I think that's how I feel right now."
A shadow falls over my eyes as Clear finishes speaking.
And then... I feel something soft against my lips.
It's probably only a few seconds at most, but it feels like ages before Clear pulls his lips away.
Sighs spill from our lips.

name: クリア
message: "...I kissed you."
Clear whispers nervously.
Something about this simple statement makes me feel painfully shy.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Don't say stuff like that."

name: クリア
message: "I'm sorry."

name: 蒼葉
message: "You don't need to apologize."

name: クリア
message: "Okay."
We speak in whispers, unable to look each other in the eye.
I'm pretty surprised he kissed me... but the most shocking thing was his declaration of love.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Hey, mind I ask you something too?"

name: クリア
message: "Yes?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "When you said you loved me... what, uh, exactly did you mean by that?"

name: クリア
message: "I meant..."
Clear pauses for a moment, then shifts his eyes to my face.

name: クリア
message: "I meant you are someone who means a lot to me."

name: 蒼葉
message: "As your master?"

name: クリア
message: "Well, that too, but more than that, you mean a lot to me as a person―as you."

name: クリア
message: "I want to keep you safe. I never want to lose you. I want to be with you forever. That's what I meant."
I'm getting more and more embarrassed.
Clear's confession took me off guard, but I guess to him, using my name carries every bit as much weight.
To be honest, I'm not really sure how I feel about Clear yet.
But oddly enough, I can't say I hated it... when he kissed me and told me he loved me.
He looks terribly anxious. Though still uncertain of my feelings, I reach out to gently stroke his hair.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Thank you."
Clear's face softens into a smile.

name: クリア
message: "No, thank you... I'm happy just to be with you."
His sincerity makes my heart ache.
Clear expects nothing from me. He just wanted to convey his love, nothing more.
But something about that... makes me kind of sad. It makes me want to give him something in return.
But I can't find the words. I'm still not sure how I feel.
So instead of words, I answer with a hug.
Clear tenses up at first before leaning, hesitantly, into me.
He's warm where our bodies touch, just as warm as any human being.
...So what if he's a machine. That doesn't matter.
I squeeze Clear tightly before pulling away.
The rain is beginning to let up a bit.

name: クリア
message: "...We should be okay now."
Clear closes the umbrella.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Looks like it."
An awkward tension fills the air. We find ourselves staring at our shoes.
